column3: The mining logic doesn't use fee estimates at all (wouldn't that be funny?), and I would expect the coin control logic to behave the same as the mining logic in this regard - is that no longer the case? Does this PR restore that expected behaviour?\n

No, with this PR coin control says estimatePriority(25) is equal to "normal" priority. The mining logic has a hardcoded "normal" priority instead. This means even after this PR, the priority labels change over time. Because the normal priority threshold floats.

The whole point of smartfee was to get rid of a hardcoded priority threshold (for the wallet, not miner),
so coin control should proba
@zander nTxConfirmTarget is unsigned int, defined in wallet.h. Yes, qBound sounds good, thanks, I will remember next time.\n
@cozz no need to wait for the next time :) Please consider updating this pull request (just fix the issue and push again to the same branch)\n
Can this comment be moved to txmempool.h ?\n
